Title: The Oath
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Adam R. Perlman, Alice O'Neill (staff writer)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Rhoades develops a new strategy. Axelrod considers a major charitable pledge.
